## Checklist
<!-- Please check the following before submitting: -->

- [ ] `zig build test` passed locally.
- [ ] `zig build test-parity` passed (if tokenizer/encoding logic changed). *Note: External contributors may skip if Python/tiktoken unavailable.*
- [ ] `zig build fuzz` run (for critical parser changes). *Note: External contributors may skip.*
- [ ] Code formatted with `zig fmt`.
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated (if applicable).
